…in the most remote corners of the world. Ready-to-use therapeutic  food, or RUTF, is a nutrient-packed peanut butter paste.

RUTF, also known as Plumpy'Nut, delivers the fat, sugar, and protein  that children with malnutrition need to survive and grow. It requires  no refrigeration, and kids show improvement and are saved within weeks.

Edesia Nutrition,…

…weight and healthy once again.

Edesia Nutrition in North Kingstown is one of two places in the  country that produces Plumpy'Nut. All the ingredients, the peanuts,  soybeans, sugar, and dairy, come from American farms and  factories. It is manufactured here in the United States and, until  recently, was shipped around the world, reaching 400,000 children…
